revised_title: Petrological Insights into Lunar Stratigraphy from Space Missions and Laboratory Analyses
tldr: The author analyzes petrological aspects of Imbrium stratigraphy using samples from Fra Mauro and the Apennine Front. They find that most clasts in the breccias show fragmental textures, indicating a fragmented pre-Imbrium crust. The study provides insights into the depth of excavation of major lunar basins and the composition of the lunar crust.
